experience.title: Undergraduate Research Assistant
experience.company: Seattle University - Department of Computer Science
experience.description: Collaborated with faculty on research regarding distributed systems performance. Developed a simulation framework in Java to model network latency in cloud environments. Optimized C++ backend routines to improve data processing speed by 30% for large-scale algorithmic simulations.

experience.title: Research Intern
experience.description: Conducted a comparative analysis of memory management techniques in C++ and Java. Authored automated scripts to monitor memory leaks in legacy software systems. Presented findings on software reliability and code efficiency to a panel of senior researchers.
